name: Sublime Text Package File
summary: Learn about .SUBLIME-PACKAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SUBLIME-PACKAGE files are used to extend the functionality of Sublime Text. You can create your own and share them with other users or download and install packages created by other users. Packages are compressed with Zip compression but can also be stored unzipped in a directory.
NOTE: Packages that come with Sublime Text will be located in the <executable_path>/​Packages directory and packages you install will be located in the <data_path>/​Installed Packages directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
